Key Match Events: Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty to give Georgia a 1-0 lead
Patrik Schick equalized for the Czech Republic with a goal that bounced in off his chest
Post-Match Reflections: Willy Sagnol, the Georgia manager, said it may take a few days to raise his player's spirits after Saba Lobzhanidze missed a chance to win the match in the final seconds
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giorgi Mamardashvili, the Georgia goalkeeper, made several impressive saves during the match
Others: The game was played at Volksparkstadion Hamburg, Germany
